revised_title: Improved Method of Dividing Astronomical Circles and Other Instruments
tldr: Henry Kater presents an improved method for dividing astronomical circles and other instruments using micrometer microscopes and a cutting point. The method involves dividing a circle into aliquot parts, marking intervals, and adjusting the microscopes for accuracy. The author provides a detailed example of dividing a two-foot diameter circle into five parts, further dividing each part into smaller intervals.
